homepage.welcome: Welcome to the fedi-beim shopping list!

appjs.registerSuccess: Registration successful. You can now log in.

shoppingList.updateConfirmation: Are you sure you want to update the list?

listEditor.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this list?
listEditor.finishChangesConfirmation: Are you sure you want to finish changes?
listEditor.archiveConfirmation: Are you sure you want to archive this list?
listEditor.unarchiveConfirmation: The list is already archived, do you want to unarchive it?
listEditor.enterNewName: Enter new name for the shopping list:

errors.unauthorizedEdit: You do not have permission to edit this list.
errors.deleteNotOwner: Error deleting the list: You are not the owner.
errors.unauthorizedView: You do not have permission to view this shopping list.
errors.invalidItemParams: Please enter correct name and quantity for item
errors.permsAfterCreation: You can edit permissions only after creating the list.
errors.noListName: The shopping list must have a name.
errors.noListItems: The shopping list must have at least one item.
errors.errorNameTooLong: The name of the shopping list must be less than 128 characters
errors.errorWordTooLong: A word in the shopping list cannot have more than 20 characters
errors.usernameExists: Username already exists, please choose another.
errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later.
errors.loginWrongNamePass: Login failed, please check the name and password.
